title: Looking for a good ADC I can support
body: I am looking for a good ADC to match my support. I am a good support, I ward constantly, build correctly, set kills up and roam well. I cant seem to climb in solo queing by myself as support because people dont know how to ADC in this elo. If you are interested hmu.

replies.body: I know the feeling. Add me in game if you wanna join up in flex queue. I queue as fill every game and know others that can play the other roles.
